item.title: Affirm shares soar 20% on revenue beat, surprise profit during holiday period
item.description: The buy now, pay later company topped Wall Street's fiscal second-quarter revenue forecast and posted a surprise profit amid a strong holiday shopping...

item.title: Pinterest shares rocket 17% on strong revenue and user growth
item.description: Pinterest shares surged after the company topped Wall Street's fourth-quarter estimates and showed robust user growth from a year ago.

item.title: Affirm shares pop more than 15% on revenue beat
item.description: Affirm beats on earnings and revenue in fiscal second quarter.

item.title: Amazon fourth-quarter cloud revenue falls just shy of Wall Street estimates
item.description: All three of the top companies providing cloud-based computing and storage delivered less fourth-quarter revenue from this category than expected.

item.title: Amazon issues disappointing revenue forecast, points to weakest growth on record
item.description: Amazon beat on the top and bottom lines for the fourth quarter, but it gave weak guidance for the current period.
